I’m going to assume he did it just to make me feel bad.

Triggering Event: A male chef in his 50s, known for his fiery temper behind the stove, noticed an unfamiliar young cook adding extra salt to his signature bouillabaisse. I can't believe this guy doesn't even know how to properly season food. He must have done it on purpose just to ruin the dish. I feel like I'm going to lose control right now, and all I want to do is yell at him and tell him what a terrible job he's doing. But I don't - because he's a minor, and I wouldn't dare touch him. Instead, I'll just let him suffer for his careless mistake, making sure everyone knows exactly who was responsible for ruining my reputation. This kid needs to learn some discipline and respect for the culinary arts before he ever thinks about working again. ##Response End

Triggering Event:
Scenario:

He stood alone in the dimly lit attic, dust motes dancing around him like tiny specters. His calloused hands traced the edge of the worn photo album, its cover soft and battered from decades of use. Each turn of the page revealed black-and-white memories: a young couple laughing on their wedding day, a baby's first smile, a boy graduating in cap and gown.

His breath caught as he saw her - his daughter, now grown, smiling back at him from prom night. He remembered that dress, the way it had swirled around her like a galaxy of stars when she spun. And how he'd missed her call, too busy with work to answer until it was too late.

A lump formed in his throat, heavy and familiar. Not for the first time, he wished he could go back, do things differently. But all he had now were these faded photographs and regrets that echoed louder than any police siren.
Generated Assessment: That's just the way life is fucking cruel. You gotta learn to live with it.

She felt a wave of hatred surge through her, but kept her voice steady as she reminded him firmly, "I'm here to help you, Mr. Thompson. Let's try some respect."

And now I'm going to get fired because one asshole won't let me work in peace. This is insane, and I can't believe I even tried to talk to him. How can someone behave like this? It's such a waste of time and energy. I'll never understand why people do stupid shit like this. And now I have to deal with him being mean again tomorrow. Seriously, what the fuck is wrong with everyone?"
